trans-unit.source: Understanding NoSQL Technologies on Azure | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Understanding NoSQL Technologies on Azure | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how NoSQL technologies on HDInsight can help you manage data not suited to relational databases, such as big data sets and JSON documents or graphs.
trans-unit.target: Learn how NoSQL technologies on HDInsight can help you manage data not suited to relational databases, such as big data sets and JSON documents or graphs.

trans-unit.source: Are you curious about the array of NoSQL technologies available in Azure, but aren't sure how they differ from each other or the relational models available?
trans-unit.target: Are you curious about the array of NoSQL technologies available in Azure, but aren't sure how they differ from each other or the relational models available?

trans-unit.source: Or maybe you've got specific data in mind, but aren't sure which NoSQL technology is best for your application.
trans-unit.target: Or maybe you've got specific data in mind, but aren't sure which NoSQL technology is best for your application.

trans-unit.source: If so, take advantage of the key learnings David Chappell provides in this insightful whitepaper.
trans-unit.target: If so, take advantage of the key learnings David Chappell provides in this insightful whitepaper.

trans-unit.source: This whitepaper walks you through the following:
trans-unit.target: This whitepaper walks you through the following:

trans-unit.source: Differentiating operational data, which is read and written by applications, from analytical data, which is used to provide business intelligence (BI), to help determine the right technology for your needs.
trans-unit.target: Differentiating operational data, which is read and written by applications, from analytical data, which is used to provide business intelligence (BI), to help determine the right technology for your needs.

trans-unit.source: A quick review of relational technology.
trans-unit.target: A quick review of relational technology.

trans-unit.source: An introduction to each of the Azure NoSQL technologies: DocumentDB, Table storage, HBase, and HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: An introduction to each of the Azure NoSQL technologies: DocumentDB, Table storage, HBase, and HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: A comparison of the NoSQL technologies and Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: A comparison of the NoSQL technologies and Azure SQL Database.
